issues.message: Add "lang" and/or "xml:lang" attributes to this "<html>" element
Remove the parentheses around the "msg" parameter (sonar.java.source not set. Assuming 8 or greater.)
A "NullPointerException" could be thrown; "hasException" is nullable here.
Remove the parentheses around the "req" parameter (sonar.java.source not set. Assuming 8 or greater.)
Add a <title> tag to this page.
Rename this method name to match the regular expression '^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Add "lang" and/or "xml:lang" attributes to this "<html>" element
Remove the parentheses around the "error" parameter (sonar.java.source not set. Assuming 8 or greater.)
Insert a <!DOCTYPE> declaration to before this <html> tag.
Remove the parentheses around the "req" parameter (sonar.java.source not set. Assuming 8 or greater.)
